title: Hotel Deal of the Week: Clontarf Castle Hotel
text:
Clontarf Castle Hotel, Dublin 3
Spellbinding ROMANCE: â‚¬410 in total for two people; 2 nights Bed & Breakfast and Dinner on one evening in Fahrenheit Restaurant.
Includes chilled champagne and handmade chocolates on arrival; and a choice of one of the following spellbinding treats: Champagne Breakfast, Rose Petal Turndown Service, late check-out, or a Pre-Dinner Cocktail or glass of wine.
This is a midweek and weekend offer, valid September 1 to November 15, 2015.
www.clontarfcastle.ie
